bit.name: Attach To Clusters By Dynamic Sphere
Effects Created By This Object Do Not Spawn Objects In Multiplayer

plugin.comment: Used by armor objects to attach properly to the base biped. The block count should be equal to the number of nodes of THIS object. "Target Node" should be set to the corresponding node in the to-be parent model. -1 does not seem possible.

bit.name: Does Not Depower Active Camo In Multiplayer
Weapon Uses Old Dual Fire Error Code

plugin.comment: Version is used for HUD coloring/outline and the "name" of a variant weapon. Corresponds to Colors 30-36 in CHGD. Technically any global color can be used via negative values, but there will be no outline. Icon values depend on the sprite bitmap referenced in the weapon's CHDT.

bit.name: Don't Clear Fire Bit After Recovering
